description.narrative: The REP will support a pipeline of sub-projects across various RE segments of the market with primary focus on solar and mini-hydro with an aggregate capacity of up to 200 MW. Implementation of these sub-projects will help attract private sector investments to climate-smart projects in Indonesia by demonstrating commercial viability of nascent and heretofore challenging segments, while facilitating market access to commercial financing.

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
